name: Admin Console Release 25.10.4
description: This release of the Admin Console brings you new feature and improvements. See below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

ADDED.text: Under the Team Management SSO section, a metadata file can be used to configure SSO for Admin Console.
When the 15 custom field limit for your Admin Console is modified via the backend, additional Custom Fields can be defined and displayed.

IMPROVED.text: In social info section of a user's profile in the Admin console, unverified emails can now be seen.
Self-serve Data Migration feature has been deprecated.
